.tile-marriott-rewards-member-rate .t-program-logo-cn::after{font-size:5.8rem}@media (max-width: 37.56rem){.tile-marriott-rewards-member-rate.l-s-padding-left-five-quarters{padding-left:1.25rem}.tile-marriott-rewards-member-rate.l-s-padding-right-five-quarters{padding-right:1.25rem}}.tile-marriott-rewards-member-rate .l-rewards-icon{font-size:3rem}.tile-marriott-rewards-member-rate .l-rewards-member-rate-text{font-size:1.5rem;line-height:1.625rem}@media (min-width: 37.56rem){.tile-marriott-rewards-member-rate .l-rewards-member-rate-text{font-size:1.75rem;line-height:1.75rem}}@media (min-width: 48.1rem){.tile-marriott-rewards-member-rate .l-rewards-member-rate-text{font-size:2rem;line-height:2rem}.tile-marriott-rewards-member-rate .l-rewards-icon{font-size:3.9rem}}.tile-marriott-rewards-member-rate.hsia{top:30px}.tile-marriott-rewards-member-rate.hsia h4{white-space:nowrap;margin-bottom:0}.tile-marriott-rewards-member-rate.hsia .t-program-logo-color-s{display:inline-block;font-size:2rem}@media (min-width: 48.1rem){.tile-marriott-rewards-member-rate.hsia{left:28%}}@media (min-width: 64.0625rem){.tile-marriott-rewards-member-rate.hsia{left:33%}}.tile-marriott-rewards-member-rate-offerNextGen{position:relative}.tile-marriott-rewards-member-rate-offerNextGen .t-program-logo-cn::after{font-size:5.8rem}@media (max-width: 37.56rem){.tile-marriott-rewards-member-rate-offerNextGen.l-s-padding-left-five-quarters{padding-left:1.25rem}.tile-marriott-rewards-member-rate-offerNextGen.l-s-padding-right-five-quarters{padding-right:1.25rem}}@media (min-width: 48.1rem){.tile-marriott-rewards-member-rate-offerNextGen{padding:0.625rem}.tile-marriott-rewards-member-rate-offerNextGen h2{margin-top:0;font-size:1.5rem}}@media (min-width: 64.0625rem){.tile-marriott-rewards-member-rate-offerNextGen{padding:1.25rem}.tile-marriott-rewards-member-rate-offerNextGen h2{font-size:2rem}}
